Welcome to the Documentation of the Iridia Swarm Robotics Demonstration for Fari

This documentation provides an overview of the Iridia Swarm Robotics Demonstration for Fari. It will guide you through the installation, usage, and technical details of the project components. Swarm Robotics is a field of robotics that studies the coordination of multiple robots to achieve a common goal. The demonstration has been developed to showcase the basic concepts of swarm robotics and to provide an interactive experience for the audience. The demonstration consists of a group of robots that move around independently in an arena and interact with each other and with the audience. based on their surrounding the robot will change their behaviour to attend specific goals. The documentation is structured as follows:

Overview Provides an overview of the demonstration. Installation Describes the installation process of the demonstration. Usage Describes how to run the demonstration. Sphero Bolt Control Module Describes the controller package. Sphero Bolt Driver Module Describes the driver package. faq and troubleshooting Provides answers to frequently asked questions and troubleshooting tips.
